name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Battery Bad - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: One or more batteries have been determined to require replacement.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Battery Bad - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - On Battery - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS is drawing power from the batteries.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - On Battery - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Low Battery - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The remaining battery run-time is less than or equal to upsConfigLowBattTime.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Low Battery - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Depleted Battery - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS will be unable to sustain the present load when and if the utility power is lost.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Depleted Battery - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Temperature Bad - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: A temperature is out of tolerance.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Temperature Bad - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Input Bad - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: An input condition is out of tolerance.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Input Bad - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Bad - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: An output condition (other than OutputOverload) is out of tolerance.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Bad - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Overload - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The output load exceeds the UPS output capacity.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Overload - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - on Bypass - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: TThe Bypass is presently engaged on the UPS.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - on Bypass - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Bypass Bad - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The Bypass is out of tolerance.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Bypass Bad - Condition no longer exists.

name.activeText: UPS Alarm - Output Off as Requested
name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Off as Requested - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS has shutdown as requested, i.e., the output is off.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Output Off as Requested - Condition no longer exists.

name.activeText: UPS Alarm - UPS Off as Requested
name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS Off as Requested - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The entire UPS has shutdown as commanded.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS Off as Requested - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Charger Failed - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: An uncorrected problem has been detected within the UPS charger subsystem.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Charger Failed - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS Output Off - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The output of the UPS is in the off state.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS Output Off - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS System Off - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS system is in the off state.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - UPS System Off - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Fan Failure - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The failure of one or more fans in the UPS has been detected.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Fan Failure - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Fuse Failure - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The failure of one or more fuses has been detected.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Fuse Failure - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - General Fault - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: A general fault in the UPS has been detected.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - General Fault - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Diagnostic Test Failed - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The result of the last diagnostic test indicates a failure.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Diagnostic Test Failed - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Communication Lost - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: A problem has been encountered in the communications between the agent and the UPS.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Communication Lost - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Awaiting Power - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS output is off and the UPS is awaiting the return of input power.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Awaiting Power - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Shutdown Pending - Condition Cleared.

description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Shutdown Pending - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Shutdown Imminent - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: The UPS will turn off power to the load in less than 5 seconds; this may be either a timed shutdown or a low battery shutdown.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Shutdown Imminent - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Test in Progress - Condition Cleared.

description.activeText: A test is in progress, as initiated and indicated by the Test Group.
description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Test in Progress - Condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Digital power supply fault - Condition Cleared.

description.inactiveText: UPS Alarm - Digital power supply fault - Condition no longer exists.
